titleStmt.title: The Christians tvvo chiefe lessons viz. selfe-deniall, and selfe-tryall. As also the priviledge of adoption and triall thereof. In three treatises on the texts following: viz. Matt. 16.24. 2 Cor. 13.5. Iohn 1.12,13. By T.H.
titleStmt.author: Hooker, Thomas, 1586-1647.

titleStmt.title: The Christians tvvo chiefe lessons viz. selfe-deniall, and selfe-tryall. As also the priviledge of adoption and triall thereof. In three treatises on the texts following: viz. Matt. 16.24. 2 Cor. 13.5. Iohn 1.12,13. By T.H.
titleStmt.author: Hooker, Thomas, 1586-1647.
Symmes, Zachariah, 1599-1671.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T. B[adger] for P. Stephens and C. Meredith, at the Golden Lion in S. Pauls Churchyard,

notesStmt.note: Editor's dedication signed: Z.S., i.e. Zachariah Symmes.
The words "selfe-deniall, and selfe-tryall", and the Bible citations, are bracketed together on the title page.
Variant: The author's initials on the title page are overstamped with a row of ornaments.
A2 is a cancel in all copies reported.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
